message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for a price of $15000. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love, and I'm willing to make a fair offer to get it into your hands.
Thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this unique item. I am willing to offer $12000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. It's a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.
I understand your perspective, Alice. While I respect the value of the product, I would like to propose an offer of $13000. I hope this aligns better with what you're seeking.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $13500. It's a compromise that I think we can both be happy with.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose an offer of $13000. I hope this offer is acceptable to you.
I've thought it over, Bob, and I'm willing to make one final offer. I can sell the product to you for $13200. It's the best I can do, but I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.
